We launched a blog to share updates on business development, products, technical insights, and news from SynCraft.

## What Is This Blog?

Welcome to the SynCraft Blog. This is where we share updates on our products, development stories, and practical insights about building apps that solve everyday challenges.

SynCraft is a small indie studio focused on products that make daily routines smoother â€” for kids, families, and anyone looking for a bit of adventure.

## What We Will Cover

Here is what you can expect from this blog:

- **Product Updates**: New features and improvements for TimeSense and STEALTH RADAR
- **Dev Logs**: Behind-the-scenes technical decisions and lessons learned
- **Parenting & Technology**: Practical tips on time awareness, routines, and habit-building for children
- **Announcements**: Company news and milestones

## Stay Connected

We plan to publish new posts regularly. If you have feedback, questions, or topic suggestions, feel free to reach out at hello@syncraft.dev.

Thank you for following along!

## FAQ

<dl class="faq-section">
<dt>Q: How often do you publish new articles?</dt>
<dd>A: We aim for several posts per month. Major product releases and important updates will be published as they happen.</dd>

<dt>Q: Is there a Japanese version of this blog?</dt>
<dd>A: Yes. Most articles are available in Japanese as well. Use the language switcher at the top of the page.</dd>

<dt>Q: How can I send feedback?</dt>
<dd>A: Please email us at hello@syncraft.dev. We appreciate all feedback and suggestions.</dd>
</dl>

TimeSense â€“ A Visual Timer with Voice Guidance for Kids
Stop saying 'Hurry up!' and start building independence. TimeSense is a visual timer and voice-guided clock app designed for children ages 4â€“10 and their families.

Stop Saying "Hurry Up." Start Building Independence.

**TimeSense** is a visual timer and voice-guided clock app designed for children ages 4â€“10 and their families.

With a dual display of an analog learning clock and a visual countdown timer, plus gentle character voice prompts, TimeSense helps kids understand "how much time is left" â€” without pressure.

Instead of repeatedly saying "Hurry up!",
children begin to move on their own.

TimeSense turns daily routines into calmer, smoother moments for the whole family.

## Why a Voice-Guided Visual Timer Works

Most timers simply beep when time is up.

TimeSense is different.

It provides gentle voice reminders at:

- 45 minutes
- 30 minutes
- 15 minutes
- 10 minutes
- 5 minutes
- 1 minute
- Final 10-second countdown

This gradual transition helps children:

- âœ” Prepare mentally
- âœ” Switch activities more smoothly
- âœ” Feel guided rather than rushed

Time becomes something they can understand â€” not something that suddenly interrupts them.

## Key Features

### Dual Display: Learning Clock + Visual Timer

TimeSense combines an analog clock for learning to tell time with a visual countdown timer that shows remaining time as a circular progress display.

Even children who cannot yet read the clock can intuitively understand how much time remains.

### Gentle Character Voice Prompts

Instead of parents repeating reminders, friendly characters guide children through transitions:

"5 minutes left!"
"Time to get ready for bed!"

Voice prompts can be turned on or off to fit your family's needs.

### Scene-Based Premium Voices

Special voice packs for:

- Morning routines
- Bedtime
- Homework time
- Getting ready to go out

Designed to match real-life daily situations and improve engagement.

## What Parents Are Saying

> â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜… **"Easy to use."**
>
> "I'm a mother of two (ages 5 and 6). The timer can be set in detail, and the simple design makes it easy to use. Instead of a sudden alarm, the 10-second countdown helps my child prepare mentally. We've stopped letting games drag on endlessly."

> â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜… **"Mornings are less stressful."**
>
> "I used to shout 'Hurry up!' every morning. Standard timers felt like I was rushing my child. With this app, the cute characters give the reminders instead, and my kids respond much better. We'll definitely keep using it."

## How TimeSense Is Different

| Feature | TimeSense | Typical Learning Clock | Standard Timer |
|---------|-----------|----------------------|----------------|
| Analog clock learning | âœ” | âœ” | âœ˜ |
| Visual countdown timer | âœ” | âœ˜ | Limited |
| Gradual voice reminders | âœ” | âœ˜ | âœ˜ |
| Routine-based voice modes | âœ” | âœ˜ | âœ˜ |
| Designed specifically for kids | âœ” | Limited | No |

## Who Is It For?

- Parents tired of repeating "Hurry up!"
- Families struggling with morning or bedtime routines
- Children learning to understand time
- Educators and childcare professionals supporting transitions

## FAQ

<dl class="faq-section">
<dt>Is it free?</dt>
<dd>Yes. Core features are free. Premium voice packs are available with a low-cost subscription.</dd>

<dt>Do I need to register?</dt>
<dd>No account or personal information required.</dd>

<dt>Can it be used in classrooms?</dt>
<dd>Yes. It works on iPad and can support group settings.</dd>
</dl>
